title: Augmented Reality-Based Collaborative Learning Process for Bravais Lattice Crystal Structures

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Practical-focused educational environment for current practitioners to strengthen spatial cognition skills

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify the three-dimensional structures of the seven Bravais lattices using an AR system
Learners can explain crystal symmetry and unit cell concepts through AR simulations in a collaborative learning environment
Learners achieve the ability to interpret crystal structures applicable to real material analysis situations via AR-based spatial manipulation training
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
